quote.p1: We've been working with Stefan for over 14 years. He has played a key-role in developing our front end. His reliability, professional expertise and his commitment have always convinced us. We particularly appreciate his innovative ideas and engagement to the continuous development of our product.
quote.p2: We'll definitely continue to work with Stefan in the future, and can highly recommend him.

quote.p1: I have worked with Stefan on front-end projects for over ten years. His work was always done on time, on budget, and with a high degree of professionalism.
quote.p2: It’s obvious he takes tremendous pride in his work, and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend or work with him again.

quote.p1: Stefan has been working for lovelybooks as a freelance senior front-end architect for nearly one year now.
quote.p2: It's a pleasure to work with him as he has done an excellent job, and I can highly recommend Stefan for his technical expertise, his reliability and the pace he gets his job done.

quote.p1: Stefan has been supporting the company for years. He played a key role in developing our front-end further and always delivered on time and with great additional ideas.
quote.p2: I would definitely work with Stefan again and can highly recommend him.

quote.p1: Stefan has left a strong and positive impression on us. He managed to familiarize himself with our complex codebase in a short time and become a productive member of the team.
quote.p2: We can therefore fully recommend him and would be happy to work with him again in the future!
